anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDrive.NAME: Improbability Drive
DESCRIPTION: Stores your #yImprobability. Certain improbable effects reduce #yImprobability.

anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDriveMalfunction.NAME: Malfunction
DESCRIPTION: Whenever you defeat a Boss, add a #yBad #ySector card into your deck.

anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDrivePortableTer.NAME: Portable Terminal
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, put any number of cards from your hand to the bottom of your draw pile and reduce their #yImprobability by #b

anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDriveRandomBuffs.NAME: Random Buffs
DESCRIPTION: At the start of each combat, EVERYONE receives random buffs. Higher #yImprobability increases the buff power and variety.

anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDriveTryNewThing.NAME: Fatten Up
DESCRIPTION: Gold rewards may be converted into card rewards. These card rewards have #b2 less cards to choose from. Bigger conversions give better rewards.

anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDriveSpecialtyIn.NAME: Specialty
DESCRIPTION: Colored card rewards may have only #b1 card to choose from. These card rewards contain an #yupgraded card.

anomalyMod:ImprobabilityDriveSurpriseEli.NAME: Surprise Elites
DESCRIPTION: Certain rooms may contain an Elite combat instead. Higher #yImprobability allows more types of rooms to have Elite combats.
